content:
I got the error

`c:\Users\Simon\.elan\toolchains\leanprover--lean4---v4.8.0-rc1\bin\lake.exe setup-file C:/Users/Simon/Documents/Uni/Vorlesungen/Seminar/mathematics_in_lean/MIL/C03_Logic/S03_Negation.lean Init MIL.Common Mathlib.Data.Real.Basic --no-build` failed:

stderr:
error: compiled configuration is invalid; run with '-R' to reconfigure
Invalid Lake configuration.  Please restart the server after fixing the Lake configuration file.

I did as advised and ran the following command in the terminal in VSCode.

c:\Users\Simon\.elan\toolchains\leanprover--lean4---v4.8.0-rc1\bin\lake.exe setup-file C:/Users/Simon/Documents/Uni/Vorlesungen/Seminar/mathematics_in_lean/MIL/C03_Logic/S03_Negation.lean Init MIL.Common Mathlib.Data.Real.Basic --no-build -R

It now is already running for more than 20 Minutes. Is it expected to end sometime or is this the server command which does continue running or is it something else? Also, was it the correct command or what else should I do?

This question is about lake on Windows OS in VSCode.
I was able to solve this issue by deleting the .lake folder and using lake exe cache get. So basically the same solution as many problems.
Simon Kirchner has marked this topic as resolved.
